Miscellaneous Highlights: Johnny Juzang has become lethal in one very critical area with the Utah Jazz, specifically his three-point shooting, with a recent 46.6% and 40% success rate in December and January, respectively.
Others: Johnny Juzang signed a two-way contract with the Utah Jazz in July 2022 and has since developed a prominent role, averaging 7.3 points over 17.8 minutes a night on 41.8/40.0/88.0 shooting splits.
New Player Records: Johnny Juzang has shot 40% or better from downtown for the second straight campaign.
Player Career Milestones: Johnny Juzang has established himself as a legitimate NBA talent and should be able to produce a sustained career in the league thanks to his one very impressive skill.
Team Performance: The Utah Jazz have a player in Johnny Juzang who is able to spread the floor and make a significant contribution to the team's offense.
Game Statistics: Johnny Juzang has played in 32 games and is posting 7.3 points over 17.8 minutes a night on 41.8/40.0/88.0 shooting splits.
Player Development: Johnny Juzang has shown improvement defensively but still needs to expand his offensive repertoire beyond perimeter shooting.
Other: The article discusses Johnny Juzang's development as a player and his impact on the Utah Jazz's performance.
